timeline.bodyText:
Though it will not make a difference for this class, but the correct implementation should be super.set / get
Instead of this.getString(), all of the APIs inside this class should be calling super.getString()
Here and below for other APIs - should be -> super.get*() and super.set*()
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the good catch. Changed to use super.*
replies.author: xinlian12

timeline.message: merge and resolve conflicts and resolve comments
